text: @SecPompeo @WHO You guys, do not take responsibility for fighting against Coronavirus, instead, you guys take all possible ones you can find, as scapegoats, you should be honest to provide facts and data, not speak out lying to cover up the truth, to aim to win the election, https://t.co/rNxocdsOep
